00031 /*
00032   This class overrides QGraphicsScene so we can handle mouse
00033   press, drag and keyboard events
00034 */

00036 {
00037     Q_OBJECT
00038

00040     typedef T_CURVE::InterpType T_INTERP ;
00041

00052
